    @allure.title("Authorization with invalid credentials")
    @pytest.mark.parametrize(**AuthParams.ddt_login_value)
    def test_login_with_invalid_credentials(self, page: Page, fake, login_value):
        login_page = LoginPage(page)
        alert_msg = "Invalid credentials."
    
        with allure.step("Test preparation"):
            login_page.goto()
    
        if login_value == "password":
            with allure.step("Enter login data with invalid password"):
                login_page.insert_email(cfg.PREMIUM_USER.get("username"))
                login_page.insert_password(fake.password)
    
        else:
            with allure.step("Enter login data with invalid email"):
                login_page.insert_email(fake.email)
                login_page.insert_password(cfg.PREMIUM_USER.get("password"))
    
        with allure.step("Click on Sign in btn"):
            login_page.click_sing_in_btn()
    
        with allure.step("Verify invalid credentials alert"):
            assert login_page.wait_for_alert() is True
